text:
I am trying my hands on local development and creating a custom CRM card. I am unable to follow through despite following the guide thoroughly. I do get this error:
``` The request in account 212325516 was forbidden. Failed to perform the action. `212325516` does not have access to this feature. Contact HubSpot support for assistance.
√ó Failed to upload simple-form project files to testhub (212325516 )
[ERROR] The post in account 212325516 was forbidden. Failed to perform the action. `212325516 ` does not have access to this feature. Contact HubSpot support for assistance.```
Which feature is being referred to?

Hello !
Can anyone tell me which language does HubSpot use for development?

Thanks!
Are you using an enterprise HubSpot account? <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CRM-Development-Tools-Beta/What-tiers-are-required-to-fully-use/td-p/707330>

Hey everyone! I'm trying to connect Tray (our iPaaS provider of choice) to HubSpot, but I keep getting the following error:
```Couldn't complete the connection
Insufficient scopes were provided. Please contact the app developer.```
It looks like the permissions are aligned though. I'm requesting:
```crm.objects.companies.read
crm.objects.contacts.read
crm.objects.deals.read
crm.objects.owners.read
crm.objects.contacts.write
crm.objects.companies.write
crm.objects.deals.write
crm.objects.custom.read```
And the app has:
```crm.objects.owners.read
settings.users.teams.read
crm.objects.contacts.write
crm.objects.custom.read
crm.objects.companies.write
crm.objects.companies.read
settings.users.read
crm.objects.deals.read
crm.objects.deals.write
crm.objects.contacts.read
crm.lists.read```
